Method Detail

deepCopy

public static <P extends PersistentObject<?>> P deepCopy(P one)
Makes a deep copy of an object. Persistent objects, arrays and collections with Child annotation are deep-copied. Persistent objects without Child annotation are shallow-copied. Arrays and collections without Child annotation have their elements shallow-copied, but new arrays and collection instances are created to hold the copies. ModificationRecords properties are not copied.

Type Parameters:
P - Type of persistent objects.
Parameters:
one - object to copy.
Returns:
Returns the copy.

deepCopyPreservingModificationRecord

public static <P extends PersistentObject<?>> P deepCopyPreservingModificationRecord(P one)
Makes a deep copy of an object. Persistent objects, arrays and collections with Child annotation are deep-copied. Persistent objects without Child annotation are shallow-copied. Arrays and collections without Child annotation have their elements shallow-copied, but new arrays and collection instances are created to hold the copies. ModificationRecords properties are not copied.

Type Parameters:
P - Type of persistent objects.
Parameters:
one - object to copy.
Returns:
Returns the copy.

deepCopyUsingAccessors

public static <P extends PersistentObject<?>> P deepCopyUsingAccessors(P one,
                                                                       boolean resetMdfRec)
Makes a deep copy of an object. Persistent objects, arrays and collections with Child annotation are deep-copied. Persistent objects without Child annotation are shallow-copied. Arrays and collections without Child annotation have their elements shallow-copied, but new arrays and collection instances are created to hold the copies. ModificationRecords properties are not copied. The user should manually set the lastModifiedBy properties before storing. It is not required to do anything for the lastModified property. This is taken care by Hibernate.

Type Parameters:
P - Type of persistent objects.
Parameters:
one - object to copy.
resetMdfRec - Indicates if the modification record properties of the copied object will be reset.
Returns:
Returns the copy.

deepEquals

public static <P extends PersistentObject<?>> boolean deepEquals(P one,
                                                                 P two)
Checks deep equality of two PersistentObjects that belong to the same class.

Type Parameters:
P - Type of persistent objects.
Parameters:
one - First object.
two - Second object.
Returns:
Returns true if the objects have all their fields equal.

getDetachStrategy

public static DetachStrategy getDetachStrategy(Object object)
Gets the detachStrategy of an object. If the object is still transient, and hasn't yet a detach strategy, then the default detach strategy of objects of this class will be returned.

Parameters:
object - Object for which the DetachStrategy is searched.
Returns:
Returns the DetachStrategy of the specified object.

setDetachStrategy

public static void setDetachStrategy(Object object,
                                     DetachStrategy detachStrategy)
Sets the detachStrategy on an object. If the object does not have such a property, then it remains unaffected.

Parameters:
object - Object on which the detachStrategy is set.
detachStrategy - The detachStrategy to set.

getManagerName

public static String getManagerName(Object object)
Gets the manager name of the specified object.

Parameters:
object - Object who's manager name is searched.
Returns:
Returns the manager name of the specified object. If there is no manager name specified for the object, returns null.

reattach

public static final void reattach(Object object,
                                  Provider provider)
Re-attaches the specified object to the specified provider.

Parameters:
object - The object to re-attach
provider - Provider to re-attach the object.

reattachForUpdate

public static final void reattachForUpdate(Object object,
                                           Provider provider)
In the unit of work that this is called, it is mandatory to perform a database update.

Parameters:
object - The object to re-attach
provider - Provider to re-attach the object.

markExplicitSave

public static final void markExplicitSave(Object object,
                                          Provider provider)
Marks the object as excluded from accidental saves due to any automation of the underlying persistence technology. This method delegates to the object's detach strategy.

Parameters:
object - Object to mark.
provider - Provider.

equalsExcludingKeyAndModification

                                                                                                                                      Class<P> poClass,
                                                                                                                                      Class<K> keyClass)
Checks two PersistentObject for equality, excluding the properties of the key, or the modification properties, in case they implement the ModificationRecord interface.

Type Parameters:

P -
Parameters:
first -
second -
poClass -
keyClass -
Returns:

serialize

public static <P extends PersistentObject<?>> void serialize(P po,
                                                             String filePath)
Serializes a PersistentObject and stores the result to a given File. The method re-throws any checked exceptions caught as a RuntimeException.

Type Parameters:
P - PersistentObject type
Parameters:
po - PersistentObject to serialize.
filePath - Resource path to store the serialized object to.

deserialize

public static <P extends PersistentObject<?>> P deserialize(String filePath)
Deserializes a PersistentObject that is stored in a given File. The method re-throws any checked exceptions caught as a RuntimeException.

Type Parameters:
P - Type of PersistentObject
Parameters:
filePath - Path of file to read the serialized object from.
Returns:
Returns an object instance.

getKeyType

public static Class<?> getKeyType(Class<? extends PersistentObject<?>> poClass)
Gets the key class of a persistent object class. Works only if the key class is a sub-type of Key.

Parameters:
poClass - Class of persistent object.
Returns:
Returns the class of key. If it isn't possible to find the key class, returns null.

getKeyProperties

public static String[] getKeyProperties(Class<? extends PersistentObject<?>> poClass)
Gets the key properties of the specified persistent object class.

Parameters:
poClass -
Returns:
Returns an array that contains the names of the read-write properties of the key class of the specified persistent object class.
